text: Lintho tsohle tse maholimong le tse lefats’eng ke tsa Allah. Re ile Ra laela batho ba Lengolo pele ho lona, hajoale re laela lona hore le boloke ts’ebeletso ea lona ho Allah. Haeba le ka koeneha, Ruri! Lintho tsohle tse maholimong le tse lefats’eng ke tsa Allah, Allah ha A hloke, ke Mong`a lithoriso ka ho safeleng
